page.title: 01KNIVETON,HOGNASTON,& ATLOW
page.content: This is an attractive area of rolling countryside.The grassy fields are bounded by hedges and occasionally dry stone walls.Wild flowers grow in abundance. The main industry is farming,dairying being the most important.There are also beef cattle and many sheep.At Atlow there is a Mushroom farm. There are signs of former industries there being a number of small abandoned quarries,old lead mine shafts and at Atlow an old watermill. Population:Kniveton 300,Hognaston 200,Atlow 100. Churches :Kniveton,Hognaston,Atlow. Chapels :Kniveton,Hognasto Post Office:Kniveton,Hognaston. Public Houses:Kniveton,Hognaston. Schools :Kniveton Caravan Site:Kniveton Bus Services:Kniveton,Hognaston.
